mapper.sql: rid, name, idCard, siNumber, registerMoney, phone, isPay, sex, age, consultation, department, did, status, registerDate, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from register
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into register (rid, name, idCard, siNumber, registerMoney, phone, isPay, sex, age, consultation, department, did, status, registerDate, remark) values (#{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sinumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registermoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ispay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{consultation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{department,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update register

idCard = #{record.idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

idCard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
siNumber = #{sinumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
